title: MVC Burgers
description: MVC Burgers is a SQL database of delicious burgers. You can make and devour virtual burgers with this Node.js application that is deployed to Heroku.

title: Math.random
description: Heads or tails? This application uses JavaScript math functions to simulate random events like rolling dice or flipping a coin.

title: API Weather App
description: This weather application calls the OpenWeather API and displays a current and five-day forecast for a searched city.

title: Velocity
description: Velocity is a full-stack application that helps users accomplish goals through planning tasks and tracking meals. This application uses Sequelize to create a SQL database of users, tasks, and meals.

title: Decider Diner
description: Not sure what to eat for dinner? Decider Diner gives meal or restaraunt suggestions based on user responses. This mobile-friendly application calls the Spoonacular and Zomato APIs.

title: Day Planner
alt: Gif of the day planner application.
description: This daily planner saves hourly events to localStorage. It features a day and night mode which dynamically updates the css styling with the click of a button.

title: Coding Quiz
alt: Gif of the code quiz application.
description: To test knowledge of JavaScript, I have created a code quiz. The quiz presents coding questions from a shuffled array and stores the user's score to local storage.
